product_name: The North Face Blaze Micro Full-Zip Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Blaze Micro Full-Zip jacket offers dependable warmth you can take anywhere. Made with synthetic insulation throughout, it provides a sleek, lightweight barrier in cold weather. FlashDry(TM) Thermal 60g synthetic insulation is extremely lightweight, warm and packable; plus, it retains warmth when wet and dries quickly. FlashDry microparticles are embedded in the insulation to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Center front, 3-color Vislon(TM) durable zip closure with interior windflap. Hem drawcord and elastic cuffs seal in warmth. Zip hand pockets. Extremely compressible, stash The North Face Blaze Micro jacket into its own pocket for easy carrying.
short_description: The North Face Blaze Micro Full-Zip jacket offers dependable warmth you can take anywhere. Made with synthetic insulation throughout, it provides a sleek, lightweight barrier in cold weather.
